name: Evaluation
description:
Evaluation

A short PS1-inspired third person adventure game about growing up and finding your place in reality.
The game focuses on rewarding exploration, features NPCs and platforming elements, all supported by the narrative and a strong eerie atmosphere.

Evaluation is my first game project. It was a wild ride, way longer to finalize than I expected, but I learnt so much along the way, and hope to do more in the future!

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys - Move
SPACE - Jump
E - Talk/Interact
ESCAPE - Skip Cutscene
R - Respawn (if you get stuck)

Credits

I crafted as much as I could do from scratch, however the following external assets were of invaluable help on pulling off the game as I imagined it:
Playmaker - Huton Games
PSX Effects - Triple Axis
Character Movement Fundamentals - Jan OTT
Basic Motions - Kevin Iglesias

More

Let me know if you find any bugs!
